1141111.content:
Fiona sat on the floor of the tent, suckling sleepily on her new pacifier. Her clothing pooled around her, now entirely too large for her to ever wear. Her eyes swirled, spirals boring into her mind, unpicking every little bit of knowledge she had learned, and melting it away. It all went, from her extensive studies in first aid and fighting, her experiences as a robber, a Freedom FIghter, a queen and a mercenary, to her personal bonds and memories, washing them all into empty nothingness. Finally, even the most basic of life skills began to leave her. Speech, walking, feeding herself, it all went.

For a moment, something in her rapidly-emptying brain told her that losing memories was bad, but another mandatory suck on the rubber bulb in her mouth doubled the intensity of the spirals, 'reminding' her that her old memories were a pain. She came for a new start, and she has it. She had her whole life ahead of her again, never to make the same mistakes she did the first time.

That was the last thought in her mind, before all of her internal thoughts dissolved into baby talk. Fiona rocked backwards, lying down as she cried out. She wailed, wept and sobbed for the embrace of a mother. The worker who had changed her was only to happy to provide, scooping up the little red ball of fluff and palcing ehr on a changing table. Dusting the kit's backside with powder, Fiona was placed into the poofiest, softest diaper available. A pink top with the word "Princess" on it in flowing cursive was quickly added, followed by a new, less draining pacifier. With that, Fiona was placed in her crib, and rocked gently until sleep overcame her.

114111111.content:
One day, not long after Fiona's arrival, the Freedom Fighters visited the orphanage. The team would do this from time to time, visiting the children and spending time with them. Sonic (wildly exaggerated) recounts of his adventures were always good stories, for one thing.

Antoine and Bunnie, meanwhile, visited the babies. With Bunnie's lower body made of metal, and no cure in sight, the two had considered adopting a child, but were unsure about doing so while Eggman was still a threat. However, the red furred, brown-haired vixen drew their attention quite quickly.

"Hey Ant, does that one look a little Fi to you?"

"Oui, it does... But tzat doesn't make sense!" He frowned. Bunnie turned to the worker with them.

"Hey, who's the red vixen?"

"Oh, Fiona? She arrived yesterday, dropped off by a woman from a travelling circus. She's in here quite often, says people keep abandoning children there. This little one's only just started teething..." She said sadly.

"Her name's Fiona too... That's weird..."

"How so?"

"We got a... former friend, a girl who used to be on the team, called Fiona."

"Oh, I remember her! She was good with the children. What happened to her?"

"She betrayed us, and joined Scourge." Antoine frowned. "But yet, tze new Fiona, she looks just like her."

"Well, I'm sure it's a coincidence..." The worker mused, as Bunnie carefully approached the girl's crib, gently scooping her up into her arms. Blearily, Fiona's eyes opened, focusing on the rabbit girl, and she cooed happily.

"Fi? Izzat you in there?" She murmured softly.

Fiona didn't give a response other than burbling and reaching for the rabbit's ear, but there was something, something in her eyes that made Bunnie think of her former friend. Some sense of lost familiarity.

"It's her." Bunnie said. "This is Fi."

"Sacre bleu." Antoine murmured. "What do we do, Bunnie?"

"Well... Ah think we need ta try to turn her back to normal..." Bunnie said. "And we need to do something about the circus, if they're the ones that did this to her."

"What if it doesn't work...?" Antoine worried, as he was wont to do.

114111111111.content:
After explaining the situation to the others, the Freedom Fighters had split up. Sonic, Sally, and Amy remained at the orphanage, looking for leads on the mysterious circus, while Tails, Rotor, and Nicole brought the DeCoolettes and the regressed Fiona to the lab.

"Alright, let's have a look at her." Nicole said, reaching out and picking up the little vixen, cradling her in her arms. Fiona giggled at the warm, tingly feeling of Nicole's hard-light body, as the lynx began to scan her. "Hmm..."

Nicole continued her scans for several minutes, as Bunnie gently stroked Fiona's hair to keep her calm.

"Alright, I have some answers." Nicole replied. "Fiona was not fully regressed at once. Her mind was altered after her body. From what it seems, it's some sort of hypnosis that wiped out all of her memories since she was a year old. However, I should be able to restore them."

"Oh, that's great!" Bunnie said.

"What about her body, though?" Tails asked. "We can't bring her mind back and leave her stuck in a baby's body for years."

"Hmm, that's true, she'd probably go nuts." Rotor said. "I know I would."

"I'm getting to that..." Nicole said.

114122.content:
"Alright then, allow me to demonstrate." THe worker smiled. She picked up the watch, and dangled it before Fiona's eyes. "I want you to focus all your attention on the swirl. Don't let anything distract you, just watch it."

"Okay..." Fiona said, as the watch began to swing back and forth. She was skepitcal that this form of hypnosis could work. Still, she wanted to try it. Maybe having her thoughts "filled with sunshine and rainbows" would help her recover from her problems. It was worth a shot. The arc of the watch captivated her. It seemed to move constantly without much input from the worker. Slowly, she began to sway in time with it. THe swirl seemed to be spinning and glowing as it did, pulling her gaze in. She couldn't look away. She didn't want to look away. The swirls relfected in her eyes, a spiralling rainbow drilling into her soft, unresisting brain.

"Your eyelids are feeling a bit heavy... You feel weary, like you haven't slept in a long while." THe worker crooned, her voice tickling Fiona's ears. Immediately, her eyelids began to drop, her posture sagged, and she let out a yawn. "Yes, very sleepy... struggling to stay awake. You can't fight it much longer, you just want to give in and let sleep overwhelm you."

"Sleepy..." She moaned, yawning again.

"That right, darling. So very, very sleepy... Just let it come. Let your mind empty, and slip into a silent, comfortable slumber." She cooed, and with that, Fiona's mind went blank and her eyes slammed shut for a moment. Then they opened, now overflowing with rainbow swirls. Her body went rigid, and she stood stiffly, staring ahead with a faint smile on her face. "Good girl... Can your hear me?"

"Yes..."

"What's your name, darling?"

"Fiona..."

"Well, Fiona, why don't you tell me about yourself. What's your story?"

"I... lost my family in the war... I don't know if they're alive or dead... I was... imprisoned... left there.... I was a petty criminal for a while... then I joined the Freedom Fighters to redeem myself... But a man named Scourge... seduced me... led me astray, made me evil..."

"Oh dear, that sounds terrible." She hugged the vixen gently. "I'm glad you came to the circus, Fiona, because we can give you a new life filled with joy and laughter. I'm especially glad you came to me, because I can take you back. I can wash away all that pain. In a few moments, your memory will be a canvas on which I can paint a new, beautiful life. Doesn't that sound lovely?"

"Yes..." Fiona slurred, her mind not exactly comprehending what was about to happen.

You know all about that, don't you?"

Your parents left you, Scourge abandoned you, the Freedom Fighters excluded you..." He petted her more gently, as her eyes began to spiral, tears flowing down her cheeks. "But the Black Arms will never betray you. We will always love you." His tail coiled around her body. "All you have to do is submit to me, and help me rebuild our race."

She begrudgingly had to expose her ears to the droning noise again to open the door - and as soon as her fingers wrapped around the handle, she could feel them land on something wet. Pulling her hand away, she could see a thin smattering of grease covering her palm - making her sneer in disgust.

"Ugh." she grumbles. "Looks like they don't exactly run a clean shop..." Upset, but not wholly discouraged, she pulls the door open.

The inside of the office is somewhat cramped - as she entered, Fiona passed a bench and a couple of mismatched chairs serving as their waiting area - and she didn't have to walk more than a few steps to reach the counter. Sitting on the opposite side, she found a simian woman leafing through an auto magazine. She seemed to be on the lanky side - her thin frame covered by an oily jumpsuit. Her fur was brown - her hair, a similar shade; but rather long and messy, falling over her eyes. Her wide, round ears poked out on either side of her head, twitching as she heard Fiona approach.

"Ooh!" she yelps excitedly, dropping her magazine onto the counter with a soft slap. "There you are!"

Fiona tilts her head. "There... I am?"

The chimpanzee nods. "Yeah! We've been waitin' for ya. You're here about the position, right?"

114331112.content:
Fiona peeled the flaps of the cardboard box back, peering inside with a sense of dread abated only by the low hum of revving engines in the garage. The walls weren't thin, by any regard - but they weren't soundproof. She wasn't sure if this was just a busy day for them, or if this was normal - but Fiona wasn't sure how the chimpanzee before her could stand the noise.

Inside the box was a neatly-folded jumpsuit - the same style, and the same drab shade of green as the woman behind the counter. The only difference she could discern was that this one was clean. Hell; arguably it was the cleanest thing about this place. Even so, she grimaced a little - truthfully, it wasn't really her style-

The woman at the counter leans forward - peeking over the edge of the box as well. She comes close enough to nearly butt heads with Fiona; close enough that the fox can smell the grease on her. "Whaddaya think? It's all-fit-one-size, so it'd look great on ya - why don'tcha try it on?"

Fiona furrowed her brow, trying to muster some reason not to; but try as she might, she couldn't. Plus - didn't she mean 'one size fits all'? "Yeah... Why don't I?" she resolves, scratching her head and pulling the uniform out. "Do you have a changing room, or something?"

The simian woman tilts her head and scratches it; mimicking Fiona. "What for?" She waves dismissively, continuing "Just throw it on over your other stuff, we'll get you out of it later."

Ignoring what it could mean, she unzips the jumpsuit and steps into it. There's something strange about watching the rather plain, unflattering garment swallow up her form-fitting outfit - and she wasn't sure whether that was a good thing or bad thing. Once it was on, she zips it up - feeling it sag slightly around her body. Looking down at the chest, she could see a small patch reading Greasemonkeys in lieu of a nametag.

"Whoa! You look great, new gal!" the simian woman chimes, hopping up onto the counter, then jumping down on Fiona's side. Fiona can feel herself smile - confused as she was, she appreciated the compliment. "So, you said you know a thing or two - how confident are ya? You wanna get right to work; or maybe brush up a little?" She jabs a thumb at a stack of manuals and magazines sitting behind the counter.

Even if the noise was bothering her, Fiona figured the garage was worth investigating more than the office was. She moved over to the open shutter and ducked beneath it - intending to slip inside quietly...

But, as her tail brushes up against the shutter, it lurches and slides downward - Fiona managed to get inside before it shut; but once it did, she heard a soft 'clunk'. Looking back at it - she couldn't see any handles on the inside - so she figured she'd have to dig around for a switch to release it, if she wanted to leave.

The sound of power tools and revving engines seemed to echo inside the garage - each stall seemed separated from the others by doorways on either side - but there were vents at the top of each wall that allowed sound to flow freely through... Among other things. The entire garage smelt like oil and rubber - it made her lightheaded and dizzy just being in here.

The stall she found herself in seemed unoccupied, as well - so she stood square in the center of it, wondering what to do next. As she set her hazy mind to work, one of the doors opened behind her - unbeknownst to the fox, she was soon joined by...

She wore no gloves, her exposed hands showing her finely manicured nails, as opposed to the sharpened claws she had before. A pearl bracelet clutched her wrist, and she felt a matching necklace around her throat. A glance in a mirror showed her that her hair was now shoulder length, curling up at the ends, with her fringe following suit. A hairband held the rest back.

"W-what is this!?" She gasped, her body holding itself in a girlish posture involuntarily.

Immediately, Fiona's head began to swim. She stumbled, clutching her forehead, her tail twitching. Slowly, knowledge of the real world began to fade away, replaced by false memories of this overly schmaltzy fabricated one. Her razor wit and fiery attitude were replaced by polite mannerisms and a demure, submissive nature. She stumbled for a moment, then stood up. One hand flew to her lips with a gasp, the other cocking out girlishly.

"Golly, Mister!" She murmured, speaking with a sweet southern drawl."Ah'm so sorry for bein' rude to y'all... Ah don't know what came over me!"

"It's quite alright, Fifi." He grinned. She would only be aware of him until he pushed the play button. Then, everything that happened to connect her with the real world would vanish from her mind for the duration of the episode. "Now, you'd best be ready. Your new beau will be here in a moment."

"Well thanks for bein' so understandin', Mister. Ah'd best get myself prepared for 'im!"

"Bother me?" She asked, raising an eyebrow. "Why, darling, you're no bother at all! In fact, I'm very glad you came here!"

"Huh?" The vixen tilted her head.

"You see, my act is missing a single crucial element! A consistent subject to get entranced by my hypnotic charms. Sure, you can rely on volunteers from the crowd, but I'd much rather have a regular assistant!"

"Well, I'm flattered by the offer, but I don't think I can accept. I'm just here for the treasure." Fiona grunted. "Besides, I'm not going to just be here and pretend to get hypnotized for you."

"There's no pretending involved, darling." Mesmerina smiled. "It's all real."

"I don't believe you." Fiona snorted. "You can't hypnotize someone by dangling a watch in front of their face and telling them to sleep! It's a myth!"

"Well, if you're so sure about that, why don't we have a bet? I shall try to hypnotize you. If I can't, I shall take you straight to your treasure! If, however, you fall under my spell... Well, you'll become my lovely assistant!"

"So all I have to do is not get zonked out by fake magic?"

"Exactly!"

114332222221211.content:
Sure enough, the mongoose produced a golden pocketwatch from her blazer. It was beautifully made, and the metal gleamed brightly in the relative gloom of the tent. Mesmerina set it,and it began to tick, then beckoned Fiona to come forward.

Sighing, Fiona climbed onto the stage, and prowled over to her new acquaintance, folding her arms and hunching up defensively as she raised the timepiece.

"Ready, darling?" She asked.

"Of course."

"Then I'll begin. Remember to do as I say until you go under. We don't want this little bet spoiled because you weren't paying proper attention, do we?"

"Guess not." Fiona shrugged.

"Good girl. Now, watch the watch..." She smiled, beginning to swing the watch back and forth in Fiona's vision. "Keep your eyes focused on it, not looking away, never closing them, just keep following that steady swing..."

Fiona did as she was bidden, watching the golden circle arc back and forth. Every swing was identical to the last, left, then right, left, then right, always a perfect arc.

The glimmer and glint of the metal caught her attention, and she leaned forward slightly, getting a closer look. The pattern still hadn't altered, still regular. Left, right, left, right. Tick, tock, tick, tock...
114332222221211.title: Mesmerina pulls out a traditional pocketwatch.

choices: She brings Fiona out of trance to taunt her.
She gets to work on making her into an assistant.
1143322222212111.content:
"Mmm, good... That's right, look closely... keep your head still, just let your eyes follow it."

Fiona's neck stiffened, her head fixed in place, as her eyes swivelled back and forth, following it left, right, left, right.

"Focus only on the watch... see nothing else..."

Fiona's view of everything except the watch began to blur.

"Listen only to my voice, and the ticking of the watch..."

The background noises of the tent, the forest outside, and even her own breathing faded from her ears. She only heard Mesmerina's syrupy voice oozing into her ears, coating her brain in a thick layer of sticky sweetness, and the regular ticking of the timepiece before her.

Tick, tock, tick, tock...


Mesmerina smiled, spotting the vixen's posture relax. It was already too late, the girl was hooked, and without outside influence, she wouldn't be waking up. She was helpless now...

"You look a little weary, dear... Do you feel weary?" She cooed.

"A little..." She'd been walking for a while now, hadn't had a rest in a long time...

"I thought so... your body must be aching, from all that running around looking for treasure.."

"Yeah..." She said. Her legs were feeling more than a little sore, now that she considered it. "I guess..."

"Mmm, yes, you're rather tired, aren't you... Very tired..."

"Tired..." Fiona yawned as best she could while still focusing on the watch. A heavy feeling of lethargy gripped her, weighing down on her.

"I knew it..." The mongoose girl smiled, petting Fiona, gently massaging her shoulder. "I could tell from your drooping eyelids..." She watched as the girl's eyelids slumped to half-cover her eyes. "Such a sleepy girl... but such a good girl too..."

"Good...?"

"Yes, of course. Even as tired you are, as sleepy, as desperate to just sleep as you might be, you're continuing to obey me and let your eyes follow the watch. You're a very good girl... a very obedient girl..."

"O-obedient...?"

"Oh, oh yes, my dear... You've done everything I have commanded. Without hesitation, you have done as I ordered... You have obeyed my every whim. You are a very obedient girl."

"I'm obedient..."

"Mhm, you are. Take some pride in that, darling! You're obedient!"

"I'm obedient!" Fiona smiled drunkenly, as much as she could muster in her dazed state.

"Mmm, so you're sleepy, and obedient..."

"Sleepy and obedient..."

"I guess that means I won."

"... won...?"

"Well yes. You're obviously hypnotized..."

"Hypnotized..."

"And we had a deal. If I could hypnotize you, you would become my obedient assistant, didn't you?"

"Yeah..." She murmured.

"Well, you're hypnotized, so that means I've won our little wager..."

"Yeah... I'm your assistant..."

"That's right!" Mesmerina smiled, running her free hand over her new captive's hair. "And now, for your reward... You may sleep, darling... Close your eyes and go completely into hypnotic sleep... Safe and relaxed... dreaming of the watch, of magic, of the circus, of me... But still receptive and obedient to my orders..."

"Yes... sleep..." Fiona's eyelids slammed shut, her body slumping forward against the Mongoose, who caught her and supported her, snuggling up to her, as she pocketed the watch.

"Come with me..."


The vixen loped drunkenly after her captor, snoring cutely as she sleep-walked through to the backstage area. There, Mesmerina laid her out on a bed, and took a seat nearby.
1143322222212111.title: Fiona falls under Mesmerina's spell.

"Yes..."

"And that means you need to know how to do it. Your role is very simple: Look sexy and do everything I say. You will never swear, you will always be on your best behaviour, because you're a good girl."

"You will keep your mind open and let me hypnotize you. You may fight it a little bit, but you will always submit in the end."

1151.content:
Her little black nose started to expand into a red ball. It stopped when it was about two inches wide.

Next, her red hair extended and became all the colors of the rainbow.

She began running through the maze, trying to find her way out, but with no luck. More changes swiftly came.

Her gear suddenly morphed into a yellow, polka dotted dress that came down to her knees, and her feet grew twenty sizes along with her shoes.

"I can't. We're having too much fun."

Last but not least, her lips puffed out a bit and turned a bright red.

Fiona: *stops to look in a mirror* What have you done?!

"I turned you into a clown, silly."

Fiona: *her lips become a forced smile, making it impossible for her to frown* W-why?

After a bit of walking around, she finally finds the exit.

Mezaro: But you won't. You had fun, right?

1151.title: Red Rubber Ball (Clown TF)

Mezaro: As you watch the coin, you continue to watch the coin, you begin to grow sleepy. You find it hard to stay awake.

Fiona: *eyes close slightly* Whatever.

11511.title: Hypnosis

115111.content:
Mezaro: Now, listen, Fiona. Whatever I say is the truth. I do not lie. You believe everything I tell you and you will do everything I tell you, understand?

Fiona: *slightly nods, still asleep*

Mezaro: Now, do you remember your old life? When you weren't a clown? No you don't. You've always been a clown, Fiona.

Fiona: I have?

Mezaro: Well of course. You were born as a clown. And you were raised in this circus. Don't you remember?

Fiona could feel her memories fading away and being replaced with new clowny ones.

Fiona: I-I think I do.

Mezaro: Good. Forget your old life. You've never gone outside. You've always been a clown, in this circus. And you've always been happy.

Fiona: Happy. I think I remember. *more memories are erased and replaced*

Mezaro: Now Fiona, when I snap my fingers, you will awaken and completely forget your old life, and only remember your clown life. Do you understand?

Fiona: I understand Mezaro.

Mezaro: *snaps fingers*

Fiona: *suddenly awakens* Oh, well, hello Mezaro. Great day today, huh? * smiles brightly*

Fiona: I think we should turn others into clowns!

Mezaro: Hmm. I like the idea. How would we do it?

Fiona: Hmm. *thinks for a moment* Ooh! I know! We can say that you can't enter the circus without a clown nose on. We can make a whole lot of clown noses that will turn the wearers into clowns and give those away at the entrance!

Fiona: Ya-huh. Ooh! It'll be so much fun! We'll be performing, and all the while, the audience will slowly be turned into clown girls!

Mezaro: Great idea, Fiona. I'll get right to work, making those noses.

Mezaro made around 2500 clown noses in one night, and just in time for the show, too. People were lined up by the hundreds waiting to get into the circus. Fiona was handing out noses at the entrance.

Fiona handed out about 1800 noses that night. Then, the show began. Everyone in the audience was wearing a clown nose that had already permanently attached itself to the wearer's face. No one seemed to notice, though. Fiona was doing usual clown things, such as juggling, pie throwing, and even got shot out of a cannon. By this time, the show was about half over. Everyone in the audience had pale white skin and bright lips that could only smile. No one had a flat chest either. Just about everyone's pants and shirt had been "clownified" at this point as well. No one seemed to notice. The show continued and the changes continued as well. Fiona was having so much fun being a clown and the audience was having so much fun watching her.

The show was now over, and everyone in the audience was a clown girl now. Everyone had a large set of breasts and no one had any male parts remaining. Almost everyone wore a cute clowny dress with big, four-fingered gloves. All of their lips were locked with a permanent smile. Some were wearing heels and some were wearing goofy shoes that seemed to fit Bigfoot rather than a human. Every clown had long hair of varying colors and each had rosy red cheeks. But it wasn't just the physical appearance that had changed, but their minds had changed as well. As far as they knew, they had always been clown girls and lived to bring joy to others.

1151222.title: Tiny Tootsie

11512221.content:
"Tootsie" skipped away from the hidden room, back into the mirror maze. Of course, with her new memories, she knew the path through like the back of her hand. As she traversed the maze, she caught sight of her new form, staring back at her with glazed, pink eyes. She'd noticed her changes as they came, but now was the first time she could look upon the completed product.

Her stark white fur contrasted her rainbow-coloured hair, fluffed up into an afro, her favourite style, and her scarlet lips and big, squeaky rubber nose- which she honked for good measure upon seeing it again, giggling in her helium-toned voice. Her feet were disproportionately large, and her shoes doubled the effect. These too made squeaking noises when she took a step, yet, despite their length, she moved with surprising grace, as if she had done it all her life. She wore a bright yellow dress, almost eye-searing, covered with polka dots, while, upon closer inspection, appeared to be red noses. Her hair ribbon had more than doubled in size, become the same scarlet, and now rested on her chest in a bow. But the thing she loved most was her new stature. Three feet tall, barely above the children that loved her act so much, with a chubby little form and a small pot belly. She was the perfect clown.

At that moment, something in "Tootsie" flickered. Her glazed eyes cleared, though remaining pink, as something that she would call "perfect" happened deep within her mind. Seeing herself this way, robbed of her height, her figure, her colour, her style, her freedom, and even her name, everything that was left of Fiona cracked and melted away, descending into the giggly, submissive madness of "Tootsie Flopperdoodle". That was who she was now. Fiona Fox was gone, done for. Even if her friends did find this place, nobody would ever suspect that it was her. Who could possibly look at "Tootsie" and see Fiona? No-one. Because she wasn't Fiona. She was "Tootsie." She wasn't "Fiona". There was no "Fiona". No "Fiona Fox" had entered the Big Top today. Tootsie Flopperdoodle had woken up here in her bed, because she lived with the circus, she always had done, and she always would.


Tootsie looked at her reflection again. She giggled happily, that strange headache being gone now, honked her nose twice, and skipped onwards, her shoes squeaking musically as she hopped. Speaking of hopping, she really did need to get her pogo-stick back... But for now, Tootsie had the perfect plan to make everyone a clown midget like her.

She headed for the refreshment stalls, where the staff seemed to greet her like an old friend, and beamed at them.

"Hey guys! Mister Mezarro wanted me to help turn eveyrone into midgets, so I thought I could put my juice into the mixers and spike all the drinks!"

But my dear, why don't you accept this new you? You were so lost and alone before, just looking for nothing but money. Now you can leave that all behind... Join the circus, be part of your new family... leave your old life behind... Never be sad or alone again, always loved, always adored..."

The ringmaster's eyes swirled, a rainbow of colours spinning through them, reflecting in the helpless vixen's gaze. Her vision dimmed, all colour washing away except for the rings. Her mouth hung open, and she tried to vocalise a response, but she couldn't. SHe couldn't speak at all! She didn't... she didn't want to speak. She just wanted a quiet life. A very quiet life. She wanted to let her Master give her a new, quiet life. She wanted to obey her Master. She wanted to be a mime.

A smile spread across her face, and her body stiffened. Her formerly graceful movements would now be stilted and awkward, like a doll.

Mezarro smiled, petting the hypnotized vixen.

"Is little Fifi ready to be my mime now?" He asked, as she stared adoringly at him through glazed grey eyes. "Fifi" nodded vigorously, her movements exaggerated and enthusiastic.

"Good girl." He smiled, allowing her to stand.

The food here is far more rapid in it's fattening effects, as shown when Rouge's gut begins bulging out rapidly, her hips and rear growing, and her heart top beginning to struggle in a matter of moments. as rouge closes in on a quarter of the buffet put away her body has grown to almost half the size of big. as her mind struggles against the onslaught of food she is....

"Mmmph...So good...But...so big..." Rouge thought as she looked down at the sight of her fat hips, and wide belly. She slowly rubs her hand against it, blushing a bit at just how soft she had gotten in her binge. "I think...that's enough for today....gotta...move on...gotta go and...a-and...

Rouge looked at the rest of the buffet, the sweet smells slowly entering her nostrils, bringing her closer and closer towards the sweet meal before her. "Gotta...get more....not full...so...soooo yummy~!" He thoughts soon trailed back to the buffet as her will was soon pushed back, in favor of continuing her feast.

And feast she did. Rouge soon resumed her gorging herself on this seemingly endless buffet, not even noticing her body rapidly packing on more and more flab as she did. Her trim, sleek arms and legs soon began to match the rest of her plump body, while the rest of her continued to swell and expand, stretching out her familiar suit in the process. Before she was almost as large as Big... with the added pounds however, she was now looking just as large, if not larger than the large purple cat himself!

Although things seemed normal, this strange growth wasn't the only thing to occur. As the bat feasted, an odd phenomena began to occur. Her body began to glow a bright purple color. Rouge however never noticed, her mind dead set on eating from her metaphorical plate. The glow continued to get stronger, Rouge starting to feel a weird tingly sensation spread all over her body.

As the purple glow got stronger, it soon began to take it's toll on the large bat. "Ugh....I feel...I feel odd..." She said as the glow began...

What me do now?” She asked. “Me come here for... something... want to do something...” She pondered and thought as best as her now tiny mind could, but just trying to make a coherent thought was a hard task. “Hmm... me figure out later.” Smiling happily, she then began to waddle towards the exit...

12113112211.content:
"...Snck....Nnngh....PFFFF HA HA HA HA HA HA!" Laughter soon filled the tent, as Fiona nearly fell forward, holding her gut in pure, hilarious surprise. Rouge The Bat was one of her longtime rivals. She had beaten her to every treasure, and beat her in every one of their fights. And now? She nothing more than a Big, Blubbery, Bumbling, Buffoon, with no memory of who the fox was. This was too much and too funny for Fiona to handle.

Meanwhile, the overblown bat tilted her head curiously and clueless as she watched Fiona laugh her gut out. "Duh....Why fox girl laughing? Who are you anyway?"

"Ha ha ha Oh man.. I'm....I-I'm sorry, I was just erm....remembering something funny." Fiona chuckled looking back at the walking, or in this case "waddling" blob of Bat that stood before her. "I'm Fiona Fox..."

Rouge looked at her with a dimwitted smile. "Hi Fiona. Me am Rouge... Um...What am I again?"

"You mean.... You don't remember?" Fiona asked with a slightly devilish smirk stretching across her face.

"Nuh uh. Me no can remember stuff good." replied Rouge. "Me just remember eating yummy food....I loved it...it soooo good~" She giggled as her mouth watered at the thought of another meal.

Fiona was now conflicted. Food here? But the place was totally empty. She could ask more questions, but this was her oldest rival after all... and in her current state she could deliver some sweet payback. Then again, if someone where to catch her in the act she could end up in a lot of trouble.

Slowly, subtly, she stopped desiring her former rival's humiliation, and started desiring to help her. To help her get fatter, of course!

12113112211221.content:
Fiona quickly found a comically long trolley, practically a whole new table with wheels on it, just outside the tent that served as a kitchen. It was piledhigh with every kind of edible treat imaginable, though all of it was sugary, greasy, fatty, and otherwise generally unhealthy. It was the single most appetising sight anyone could ever see.

And yet, Fiona's thought upon seeing it wasn't that she should eat some for herself. Her stomach didn't make the slightest gurgle. No, the only thought in her mind was that she had to bring the table to Rouge. A girl of her size clearly needed a meal like this! She quickly positioned herself at the end of the trolley, and began to slowly push it toward the bat's location.

Surprisingly, despite its massive length, the sheer weight of the contents, and the general instability of caster wheels, along with Fiona being just one, ordinary Mobian vixen, the trolley was easy to control. She steered it past tents and stages and props, easily guiding it toward Rouge's corpulent form.


As she walked, a peculiar change came over her outfit.

First, the entire ensemble's material changed from tight leather to soft, silky cotton. Her belts shifted, thickening up as they fused together and formed into a skirt, which lengthened and spread into puffy, wide bell-shape. Chiffon appeared underneath it, keeping it outstretched as white frills appeared along the outside.

Her boots changed next, steel toes pinging off as they slid down her legs, melting into a pair of cute high-heels. She stumbled slightly as said heels formed underfoot, but stayed upright, as her pants turned white. The legs separated, sliding down to the middle of her thighs, while the remainder tightened around her crotch and backside, becoming a frilly pair of white panties.

Her gloves went next, but their change was relatively simple, turning white as black, lacy cuffs appeared around her wrists.

Her top, meanwhile, was shifting the most. The neckline dropped, exposing more of her cleavage as the straps widened, reaching over her shoulders and down to where her gloves stopped, before poofing out into a pair of puffy, round sleeves. But as the neckline continued to drop, they all but separated, the top now just reaching up to her chest, more a fancy corset than a shirt, as it flowed down over her midsection and fused with the skirt, forming a dress, as the whole ensemble gained increasingly elaborate frills and lace.

A white apron formed on the front of her dress, tied in place with a large ribbon around her waist, which made a huge bow just above her backside. At the same time, her actual bow was reshaping into a maid's bonnet, white in colour, just as a lacy choker appeared around her neck.


Fiona arrived back in the room where the mostly-immobile Rouge awaited her, swelling with pride when she saw the bat's eyes light up at the sight of her cargo.

Now it was once again covered in the most mouth-watering dishes ever seen.In fact, not only were there exquisite high-class foods waiting for her to try them, but some wonderful guilty pleasures, and, curiously, some of her particular favourite meals.

Her stomach gurgled at her. It had been a long time since she'd had a good meal. In fact, not since she'd left Knothole with Scourge had she eaten properly. And it wasn't like the glutton beside her was going to be able to reach all of this stuff as quickly as she could... It was hers for the taking.

Fiona walked toward the other end of the table, mouth watering. One plate wouldn't hurt, right? Two would be fine too. Maybe even three...

She reached the table, grabbing an empty plate and reaching for the food. Just four plates. She'd just have five plates and then she'd be done. She was sure she could resist her stomach's urges, a hell of a lot better than the bat did. She was a lot stronger, and she knew that. She could stop at six plates if she wanted.

She began to pile food onto the first of her seven plates, not knowing that, for all her bravado, Rouge had at least had to start eating before she started to lose her grip on her appetite, while the simple smell of the food had gotten Fiona to start on an eight-plate binge.

It wasn't like Rouge was going to be able to reach msot of this stuff anyway. She wouldn't begrudge Fiona nine plates of the food.

Heck, this was an all-you-can-eat buffet, and Fiona had ten long years of poor meals to make up for. She knew she could eat at least ten plates.

Fiona couldn't help but keep staring at the spread. Even with the mass of bat standing besides her, acting as a reminder of what could happen, she just couldn't resist staring at it. Everything looked so succulent, so delicious, so sweet, crunchy, and amazing!

"Ugh! What's the matter with me?!" She asked herself. "I know I'm a bit hungry, but I can't eat this. There's obviously something wrong with it if Rouge is anything to go by. She must've ate the whole spread, and because of it, she turned into a large, fat, lazy dimwit! I know it's a bad thing, but... why can't I stop looking at this meal, knowing that if I eat from it then I'll also turn into a big, fat....lazy....blissfully relaxed...." The vixen's words trailed off as an unfamiliar thought crossed her mind... All these conflicting feelings bumping against each other, soon sparked something that Fiona hadn't considered before. Maybe she couldn't take her sights off the food....because deep down... she also wanted to be like Rouge?

"...No. That's stupid! Why would I give up my figure...my own intelligence just to be big, waddling whale of a fox?!" She paused to think trying to favor the cons to turn herself away from it...yet something crept up to enlighten her current situation. Rouge, despite her size and current lack of intelligence looked....happy. Relaxed. Blissfully enjoying herself without a care in the world. Whereas Fiona had constantly been living a rough and stressful life of abandonment, and pain. Maybe...she wanted this just so she could have a way to finally have some kind of joy and happiness in her life. Even if it meant tossing away her old self to whatever weird shlock was in this meal.

"...Maybe it's temporary." She thought, as she reached down, grabbing a juicy drumstick from a nearby smoked turkey. "...Oh I still don't know...but...I...I just want one moment of bliss....I just want one moment of happiness and enjoyment....I just... want..." She said as she stared at the drumstick ".....one little taste."
121131122133.title: A Big Fat Desire

choices: Fiona loses herself in the meal even faster, mind melting more than Rouge's did.

1211311221331.content:
Fiona's teeth stabbed into the meat, and she tore a huge mouthful off, chewing messily before gulping it down, and her eyes glazed over. She had found nirvana.

At the other end of the table, Rouge gave an approving coo between mouthfuls of burgers. Far from being angry at the idea of Fiona encroaching on her meal, instead she seemed happy to share. Happy to welcome Fiona to her new life as a bloated bimbo.

Fiona smiled blissfully back, and dug in, tearing whole chunks of meat off of the bone, before tossing it over her shoulder and grabbing the second leg with one hand, while the other raised to her mouth so she could slurp the fatty grease off of her fingers. Already her stomach was gurgling, not with hunger but with happy acceptance of its looming bloat. Body and mind, she wanted it. It wasn't just mindless gorging like Rouge had done, Fiona had a goal. A goal to be as big and bloated and brainless as the bat that had once been her enemy, her rival, and was now her idol. Her swelling sister.

As Fiona polished off the second drumstick, disposed of the bone, and slurped up the juices once more, she began to reach for the main body of the turkey, grabbing it in both hands.

"Hey... Fifi..." Rouge cooed from the opposite end. "Race you to the middle..."


A gleam of pride crossed Fiona's glassy eyes. A spark of the old rivalry that she had been eager to abandon just a second ago. But an eating contest? That was right up her new alley. Besides, it was just a friendly match between portly pals. And with her smaller form... she could expect a victory.

"You're on..." She slurred, glugging down a jug of soda and burping loudly before resuming her meal.

However just as expected, the more she ate the more her body would swell and grow, getting fatter and more plump with each finished course. But she didn’t care. This rapid increase in growth wasn’t gonna stop her from winning. However in her binge, the vixen couldn’t see that she was growing a lot faster than when Rouge did. While the bat binged and morphed at a moderate pace, Fiona was eating way more quicker, causing her transformation into a Big Flabby Fox to go at a more rapid pace.

Of course, like with the bat, her mind and mental capabilities would also undergo the same fate but much faster. She could actually feel her mind getting smaller, and her head becoming more empty as things such as memories of her old life, her combat skills and even the most basic of math and literature skills began to just disappear. Fiona just smiled though. She kept eating and eating, both gaining and losing more than what Rouge had experienced...

The contest continued on and on... until eventually....

1212.content:
As Rouge walked into the back room, she found herself in a wide, empty room with a few windows, some big mirrors and monitors. At the center she saw the only other piece of tech aside from the monitors; a large pod, big enough for a person to walk into, and a big computer terminal.

“Hmm...” She fluttered over to the computer and looked at the keyboard, only to find a note in one of the compartments. “Hmm... “Thank you for your purchase. 131121.content:
Almost the first mirror Fiona came across was exactly what she expected: It made her look fat enough to make Eggman look athletic by comparison. She rolled her eyes at the clear low-brow joke. What was next, toilet humour?

Still, there was something off about the image. Normally, a mirror like this would make her reflection look comically mismatched. A wide, heaving lower body, with her unaltered head on top, with her legs and feet looking almost as distorted as her gut.

But this was different. The rotund Fiona in the mirror wasn't simply a stretched-sideways reflection of her normal self. Rather than simply looking out-of-scale with the rest of her, her belly was spilling out over the waistband of her leggings, which looked like they were struggling to hold together. Her belts had snapped, and now rested uselessly near her boots, which themselves had been stretched and warped by the massive increase in the thickness of her legs, which wobbled like jelly with every step the vixen took closer to the mirror.

Her arms were similarly chunky, her gloves long-since having been split apart, while her fingers were fat little sausages, and looked to be covered in greasy food. Her breasts were huge, former C-cups now a generous G-cup, sagging down free of any semblance of a bra, her top not quite able to hold them in, as they rested on her heaving stomach.

But the biggest giveaway was her face. Rather than a normal head atop this warped body, her face had changed to match. She had plump, rosy cheeks, thick lips, and a second chin. But despite that, and the immediate revulsion Fiona felt upon seeing this corpulent copy of herself... she was smiling.

More specifically, she was smiling a contented, carefree smile. She was the size of a blimp, and yet she didn't seem upset about it at all.

A thought wormed into Fiona's mind: This version of her was fat and lazy because she was happy. She didn't have a care in the world. No wars to fight, no enemies to flee, no food shortages or traumas or anything. She had the total freedom to just... sit around and eat all day... Fiona almost envied her...

It was clear from the vacant look in Fat Fiona's eyes that there wasn't much going on upstairs either. She probably didn't think about much beyond her next meal... but given the life Fiona herself remembered... maybe ignorance really was bliss... After all... Fat Fiona was happy and well-fed, and Regular Fiona was neither... Her stomach gurgled to remind her of her own lack of good food. Or any food, really. And as she stared more and more... she realised that she... wanted to share Fat Fiona's lifestyle...

The more she watched her gormless, guzzling counterpart, the less repulsed she felt by her appearance. The more she wanted to to emulate it. The more she relaxed into a blissful daze. The more hungry she felt.


As Fiona stared into the mirror, the pink glow returned, flooding out and into her eyes as they began to swirl. A content, lazy smile formed on her face, and she began to reach out for the mirror, her hand rising without any input of her own. Her fingertip touched the mirror, and...
131121.title: ....fat, lazy...but also happy.

No, she was naturally and perfectly proportioned, with long, voluminous hair, a large, plentiful bust, a narrow waist, and wide, child-bearing hips, as if she'd grown up into a perfectly-molded woman.

What really surprised her, however, were the clothes she wore.

Her body was wrapped in a form-fitting black gown, highlighted with gold trim. The sleeves were short and puffy, giving way to a pair of long black opera gloves. From what little she could see, she appeared to be wearing dainty high-heeled slippers. Her fingers were covered in rings, a beautiful necklace hanging down to her bust, while her ears were pierced, simple pearl earrings in them. Atop her head rested a crown of gold. Mobius' crown.

She was a queen. Not in the "My boyfriend says he's king and he'll beat you up if you disagree" sense that she was before, but a real queen. Rich. Powerful. Pampered. Loved.

info.brief_description: Rouge and Fiona encounter an abandoned Circus tent and soon become victim to many changes.
info.description:
Fiona Fox and Rouge the Bat team up, or head out on their own to investigate a mysterious circus tent that has mysteriously shown up in the great forest. Unbeknownst to them, what they find soon leads into hi-jinks that could alter them in various wild, wacky or reality bending ways. Will they make it out, or will they become the newest additions to the show? You decide.

Anything goes but none of the following:
Blood
Gore
Death
Anything Overly Sexual (Implications are okay but nothing too Adult)
Any other things that maybe deemed as "Inappropriate"

Other than that, just have fun with it!
info.pretty_title: Mobius Circus of Change: Rouge & Fiona
